attributes.action: Allow people freedom to decide for themselfs if a game is ok to play
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is to allow everyone in the uk the oppurtunity to be able to make there own minds up about PC and Video games, we understand that games should be reviewed and given a classification to suggest an appropriate age that may be correct for the content, but under no circustances should games be banned or subject to non release of the basis of its content, consumers and the general public of the UK should be able to make their own minds up as to whether a game is a correct choice for them, should the game contain Offensive, Voilent, Crude, Lude,  Suggestive, Drug Related, Sexual, or any  material deemed not acceptable for any one under the age of adulthood of 18 years of age, then it should be clearly marked upon the product case, label or packaging, by signing this petition it is agreed that adult sof the UK need not have a nanny state situation invoked upon Gaming and the entertainment that it brings, no evidence is present or prooven to show that it is corrupting to children let alone adults and as such it should be made to face only certification and not be subject to any sort of Banning or non release.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
